com.pega.pegarules.pub.connect.oauth2

Interface OAuth2Client


  • public interface OAuth2Client
    This interface defines contract for OAuth 2.0 consumer implementation APIs

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String OAUTH2_SELF_CLIENT 
      static java.lang.String VERSION 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getAccessToken()
      Gets an access token for an instance of OAuth2 client It retrieves a valid existing token, if available or obtains one using the token endpoint details provided in authProfilePage

      Gets an access token using the given authorization code

      verifies if the token is expired

      void purgeOauth2DBEntries(java.lang.String className)
      Called from agent to cleanUp data from DB.
      ClipboardPage retrieveAccessToken()
      Gets an access token for an instance of OAuth2 client It retrieves a valid existing token, if available or obtains one using the token endpoint details provided in authProfilePage
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> revokeToken()
      revoke the access token for a given client id , client secret and scope Tries to delete the access token from the provider and then from pega
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> revokeTokensForAllUsers()
      revoke the access tokens for a given client id , client secret and scope Tries to delete all the access tokens for all users from the provider and then from pega.

      Updates HTTPRequest object with the access token.

    • Method Detail

      • getAccessToken

        java.lang.String getAccessToken()
        Gets an access token for an instance of OAuth2 client It retrieves a valid existing token, if available or obtains one using the token endpoint details provided in authProfilePage
        Returns:
        A string representing access token or null if unable to get an access token for the given input parameters
        Throws:
        PRRuntimeException - if encounters any problem while getting the token

      • getAccessToken

        java.lang.String getAccessToken(java.lang.String aAuthCode)
        Gets an access token using the given authorization code
        Parameters:
        aAuthCode -
        Returns:
        A string representing access token or null if unable to get an access token for the given input parameters
        Throws:
        PRRuntimeException - if encounters any problem while getting the token

      • retrieveAccessToken

        ClipboardPage retrieveAccessToken()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Gets an access token for an instance of OAuth2 client It retrieves a valid existing token, if available or obtains one using the token endpoint details provided in authProfilePage
        Returns:
        A ClipboardPage representing access token or null if unable to get an access token for the given input parameters
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getAccessTokenFromEndpoint

        @Deprecated
ClipboardPage getAccessTokenFromEndpoint()
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Deprecated. 
        Gets an access token for an instance of OAuth2 client It retrieves a valid existing token, if available or obtains one using the token endpoint details provided in authProfilePage Rules should use getAccessToken(), getAccessToken(String) or retrieveAccessToken().
        Returns:
        A string representing access token or null if unable to get an access token for the given input parameters
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if encounters any problem while getting the token

      • revokeToken

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> revokeToken()
        revoke the access token for a given client id , client secret and scope Tries to delete the access token from the provider and then from pega
        Returns:
        response map containing detail whether revocation is successful or not

      • revokeTokensForAllUsers

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> revokeTokensForAllUsers()
        revoke the access tokens for a given client id , client secret and scope Tries to delete all the access tokens for all users from the provider and then from pega.
        Returns:
        response map containing detail whether revocation is successful or not

      • hasTokenExpired

        boolean hasTokenExpired(ClipboardPage tokenPage)
        verifies if the token is expired
        Parameters:
        tokenPage -
        Returns:
        returns true if the token is expired otherwise false

      • getFreshAccessToken

        java.lang.String getFreshAccessToken()
        Purges the access token and invokes access token endpoint
        Returns:
        String new accesstoken

      • getHttpRequestUpdatedWithAccessToken

        @Deprecated
java.lang.Object getHttpRequestUpdatedWithAccessToken(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> map)
        Deprecated. 
        Updates HTTPRequest object with the new access token. Works only with com.pega.apache.http.client.methods.HttpUriRequest.
        Parameters:
        map - map comprising HttpUriRequest, URI and accesstoken
        Returns:
        Object HttpUriRequest object passed in, updated with the input access token.

      • updateHttpRequestWithAccessToken

        boolean updateHttpRequestWithAccessToken(java.lang.Object aHttpRequest,
                                         boolean aGetFresh)
        Updates HTTPRequest object with the access token. If access token is expired, it will fetch a fresh one, according to grant type.
        Parameters:
        aHttpRequest - PegaRESTClient implementation to set access token
        aGetFresh - Attempt to retrieve a fresh access token
        Returns:
        if request updated, true or false

      • isAccessTokenPresent

        boolean isAccessTokenPresent()
        Will retrieve access token, possibly performing refresh operation and update cache.
        Returns:
        true if any access tokens are present for operator, false otherwise

      • isAccessTokenPresentForAnyUser

        boolean isAccessTokenPresentForAnyUser()
        Check if access token is present for given client id, scope and grant type. I.e. if any token is present for any user for the auth profile. Will not perform refresh operations or alter cache state.
        Returns:
        status: true if any access tokens are present for any user, false otherwise

      • getAuthorizeURL

        java.lang.String getAuthorizeURL(java.lang.String aGadgetID)
        Generate authorization URL to initiate Authorization Code flow.
        Parameters:
        aGadgetID - Used to restart UI flow from where it left off when access token is received.
        Returns:
        URL to open in new window.

      • updateHttpRequestWithAccessToken

        boolean updateHttpRequestWithAccessToken(java.lang.Object aHttpReqObj,
                                         boolean aGetFresh,
                                         java.lang.String aAccessToken)

                                        java.lang.String oauth2Token)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • purgeOauth2DBEntries

        Parameters:
        className -
